thread.title: CBS Cancels ‘Doubt,’ the First Primetime Network Drama with a Transgender Series Regular, After Just Two Weeks
thread.title_full: CBS Cancels ‘Doubt,’ the First Primetime Network Drama with a Transgender Series Regular, After Just Two Weeks

author: Michael Schneider
title: CBS Cancels ‘Doubt,’ the First Primetime Network Drama with a Transgender Series Regular, After Just Two Weeks
text: The drama, starring Katherine Heigl, Dulé Hill, Elliott Gould, and Laverne Cox, was a quick ratings disappointment.
